import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";// Material Dashboard 2 React base styles
import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";var transparent=colors.transparent;var lg=boxShadows.lg;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var popover={styleOverrides:{paper:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,boxShadow:lg,padding:pxToRem(8),borderRadius:borderRadius.md}}};export default popover;
